roleset.name: to serve or summon with a subpoena

example.name: autogen1
example.text: the committee authorized a subpoena to compel Mr. Keating to testify
example.arg: to compel Mr. Keating to testify

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the last-minute subpoena for more than 100 boxes and file cabinets of documents
example.arg: for more than 100 boxes and file cabinets of documents
